criteria_verification.criterion_text: Technology seam tests cover all 6 identified seams
criteria_verification.evidence: All 6 seams covered: (1) Markdown<->Frontmatter parsing: TestEpicRefineUpdateInPlace, TestRefinePreservesFrontmatter, TestEpicRefineRefinementHistoryAppend; (2) Frontmatter<->Completeness scoring: TestEpicCompletenessEmptyEpic through TestScoreCalculationDeterministic; (3) Refinement<->Graphiti push: TestSyncAfterRefinement, TestSyncGracefulDegradation, TestSyncEpisodeSchemaEpic/Feature; (4) Organisation pattern<->Display: TestHierarchyViewAllPatterns, TestEpicStatusDirectDisplay, TestEpicStatusMixedWarning; (5) Cross-command<->Consistency: TestPatternTerminologyConsistency, TestFeatureRefineCrossCommandSuggestions; (6) Config<->Standalone mode: TestSyncStandaloneMode.

criteria_verification.criterion_text: Graphiti tests include both enabled and disabled modes
criteria_verification.evidence: Disabled mode: TestSyncStandaloneMode (4 tests) verifies config defaults to disabled, standalone behaviour documented, and both epic/feature refine work without Graphiti. Enabled mode: TestSyncAfterRefinement (3 tests) verifies push-on-refine and sync_on_refine config. Degradation: TestSyncGracefulDegradation (3 tests) verifies markdown saved and warnings shown when Graphiti fails.
criteria_verification.notes: Disabled mode: TestSyncStandaloneMode (4 tests) verifies config defaults to disabled, standalone behaviour documented, and both epic/feature refine work without Graphiti. criteria_verification.criterion_text: Organisation pattern tests cover all three patterns
criteria_verification.evidence: TestEpicCreateDefaultPattern (features default), TestEpicCreateDirectPattern (direct flag/hierarchy), TestEpicStatusMixedWarning (mixed warning), TestHierarchyViewAllPatterns (all three patterns in tree view including [Direct Tasks] grouping), TestBackwardCompatibility (legacy epics default to features), TestPatternTerminologyConsistency (consistent naming across epic-create, hierarchy-view, epic-status).

criteria_verification.evidence: Empty: TestEpicCompletenessEmptyEpic (new epic=0), TestFeatureCompletenessEmpty (new feature=0). Partial: TestEpicCompletenessPartial (9 dimensions with weights). criteria_verification.evidence: conftest.py provides: 7 session-scoped spec-loading fixtures (epic_refine_spec, feature_refine_spec, etc.), graphiti_config fixture, helper functions (extract_frontmatter_block, parse_frontmatter, extract_section, build_epic_markdown, build_feature_markdown, parse_markdown_frontmatter, update_frontmatter_field, append_refinement_history). criteria_verification.criterion_text: Tests are independent and can run in any order
criteria_verification.evidence: All tests are independent: spec-validation tests read immutable command markdown files, functional tests build fresh markdown in each test method. No shared mutable state between tests. No test depends on another test's output. Session-scoped fixtures are read-only. All 85 tests pass with no ordering dependencies.
